  • Method Details

    • getTransactionHistory

      public com.revature.thevault.presentation.model.response.builder.GetResponse getTransactionHistory(Integer accountId)
      Retrieves a transaction history with the account id as parameter. To create a transaction history all the account deposits are called through deposit service, and all the account withdrawals are called through withdraw service. The list is sorted in descending order by date. This account info is converted and returned as a ResponseObject to the requesting controllers
      Specified by:
      getTransactionHistory in interface com.revature.thevault.service.interfaces.TransactionServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      account - id
      Returns:
      GetResponse object
